items.sentence: If the baby hadn't started crying, the soldiers wouldn't have noticed us.

Tom and Mary both played in the same orchestra, but not at the same time.

Tom told me that he used to play the clarinet when he was in high school.

All of the passengers managed to escape before the bus burst into flames.
You promised me that you wouldn't spend any more money on computer games.
